title: AEIOUdan: Douro no Tadashii Watari Kata
original_name: あいうえおうだん－どうろのただしいわたりかた
sinopse: A Toyota Motor commissioned work for children aged 3-5, so that they could learn about traffic safety. The title is a fusion of the English vowels AEIOU and the Japanese word for crossing (oudan) the road.
